name: Chatwoot Development Codespace
initializeCommand: echo GITHUB_REPOSITORY_OWNER=$(echo $GITHUB_REPOSITORY | cut -d'/' -f1) > .env && echo TAG=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | tr '/' '-') >> .env
postCreateCommand: .devcontainer/scripts/setup.sh && yarn check || yarn install && bundle check || bundle install && POSTGRES_STATEMENT_TIMEOUT=600s bundle exec rake db:chatwoot_prepare
